about.me: With strong investment in robust infrastructure, we guarantee that our system operates stably and reliably 24/7, helping our customers earn attractive profits from staking activities on the Cardano network. With an experienced and attentive team of experts, we are committed to delivering a superb and valuable experience to our customers. Thank you for considering our services. If you have any questions or requests, please do not hesitate to contact us for detailed advice.
about.server: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS X64 server, 8 Core Processor CPU's, 48 GB RAM, and 250 GB SSD disk, 99.9% uptime
